title: Missing Inspiration Rune ?
body:
Hi guys,

I am new to this game, and recently I learned that there are 5 runes in LoL (sorcery, precision, domination, resolve, inspiration). But I cannot see the Inspiration rune? Is there anything that I am missing / not understand?

Thank you!

replies.body: The inspiration rune tree should unlock at level 17 since it's got a few more nuanced choices in there. I don't think they wanted really new players getting confused with some of those more complicated options.
Ty! :) Lol wiki should get that info! Atm it say: "[The new system is available to summoners of all levels at no cost](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Runes_Reforged)"
